giftCardSection.title: Tallata Shafin Ka
giftCardSection.description: Saka hanyar shiga shafin ka na ARTMO a shafukan yanar gizon ka.

giftCardContent.title: Tura Katin Kyauta na ARTMO ta hanyar Imel. Wanda aka turawa zai iya amfani dashi wajen siyayyan zane.
giftCardContent.quesion: Tura wannan katin kyauta zuwa ga...
giftCardContent.lastNote: Za'a samu bayanan katin a bangaren Asusu Na. Zaka samu shedar tabbatar da siya cikin imel dinka.
giftCardContent.sentFrom: Wannan Katin Kyauta naka ne da aka aiki daga...
giftCardContent.use: Kayi amfani da katin domin siyan zane.
